name: Elemental Break
description:
A retro style brick breaking game featuring:

-omni-directional gameplay with linked horizontal and vertical paddles

-colored blocks that interact differently with the ball to create challenging precision based content

-10 challenging levels that are repeated with a faster ball if you finish all of the levels

-high score tracking for your machine

As a game developed in unity personal the game will attempt to collect anonymous hardware statistics when launched. Blocking this does not in any way affect your ability to play the game. For more information regarding Unity's collection of anonymous hardware statistics and their privacy policy visit: https://unity3d.com/legal/privacy-policy
